alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Volusia; Inland Indian River; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Northern Lake County; Okeechobee; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 22 at 1:44AM EST until December 22 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Most of east central Florida. * WHEN...Until 9 AM this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities were rapidly dropping below one mile across much of east central Florida. Conditions support continued the development of widespread dense fog lowering visibilities to one quarter mile or less across the advisory area.
info.instruction: If you plan on driving early this morning, plan on leaving early. to allow yourself plenty of time to arrive at your destination safely. When driving in dense fog, slow down, use only your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
